title: Linux head Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux head command and learn how to use it effectively for text processing and editing tasks. Discover practical examples and master the various options to extract the top lines from files.

meta.title: Linux head Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux head command and learn how to use it effectively for text processing and editing tasks. Discover practical examples and master the various options to extract the top lines from files.
meta.keywords: Linux, head command, text processing, text editing, file manipulation, command line, practical examples

verify.name: Verify the head command
verify.hint: Ensure that the `head` command is displaying the first 5 lines of the `example.txt` file correctly.

verify.name: Verify the head command options
verify.hint: Ensure that the `head` command with the `-c` option is displaying the first 20 bytes of the `example.txt` file correctly.

steps.title: Apply head Command in Real-World Scenarios

verify.name: Verify the head command in real-world scenarios
verify.hint: Ensure that the `head` command is displaying the first 5 lines of the `/var/log/syslog` file correctly.
